titles.title: National Domestic Preparedness Consortium Expansion of 2007
A bill to expand the National Domestic Preparedness Consortium to include the Transportation Technology Center.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 1/4/2007--Introduced. National Domestic Preparedness Consortium Expansion Act of 2007 - Includes the Transportation Technology Center located in Pueblo, Colorado, within the National Domestic Preparedness Consortium.
